column5: Hello.  Anyone know anything about Clay Lake?  I fished there about 20 years ago. Stayed at Northstar Lodge.  Just wondering if there is a public boat landing on the lake to launch your boat to fish on your own w/o going through the resort.  Let me know if anybody knows anything.
Clay lake is a very good fishery for walleyes but I would'nt want to eat any. I believe that is directly downstream of the pulp mill in Dryden and there have been issues.
